reviews.title: Good location, modern style
reviews.text: We stayed at Hotel 27 for an extended weekend in February 2008 and really enjoyed our stay. The hotel is in a great location, close to both the railway station and major attractions. It has been decorated in a very modern style but luckily without it getting sterile. In fact, the bar and lounge areas were very homely and cosy, especially during breakfast and dinner buffet hours when it almost felt like a large in-home dining room. The breakfast was fine, all service worked well and the room was functional - plus for the very comfortable bed. Also the complementary aperitif/dinner buffet was a pleasant surprise and actually had us skip dinner outside one night. The only little complaint I would have was on the cleanliness; our room was not the most spotless I have seen with eg. bread crumbles on the bedside table... But all in all, the experience was good and I would recommend this hotel to my friends.

reviews.title: Fantastic Mojitos
reviews.text: Stayed here with 3 friends and couldn't have asked for more. Comfortable rooms, friendly and helpful staff, even let us book in early. The red haired bar manager makes the best Mojitos in CPH, and she is alos very hot!!!! Great hotel in the heart of the city.

i stayed in this hotel for 2 nights from 23-25 Oct. The hotel design is modern and the staffs are very friendly and helpful. I have booked a single standard room, the bed is comfortable and the room is clean. The room price is also incl. breakfast and dinner buffeted. (They charge extra fees if you order wine or drinks)
reviews.title: Nice room

likes.liked: — The bed and the room desgin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For me the only problem was the noise from the street side at night as there is a bar next to the hotel.
reviews.title: Compact but convenient

likes.disliked: — Size of room and no air-con

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small, modern, clean hotel room in a convenient location. The bed was comfortable and even though I was concerned when I saw the complimentary ear plugs, we didn’t have any problems sleeping at night. Sleeping during the day may be a bit more of a challenge, as you can hear the town clock striking every 15 minutes – it seems to stop during the night from what we could tell (and we are light sleepers). There is no fridge or air-conditioning and we found the room got a little bit stuffy, but wasn’t too bad. We also tried out the Ice Bar which is quite expensive – but if you are staying there, then why not give it a try? The location is excellent. We stayed for 2 nights in late July 2007.
reviews.title: Bad experience

likes.liked: — location in the city - but not the neighborhood

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here to begin our 3 week visit to Scandinvia. While planning my trip, I did a lot of research on the hotels in each city and the Hotel 27 always had the best reviews for the price range we were looking at. I had read the reviews of the hotel before booking and I was crossing my fingers as we arrived for check-in.
reviews.title: Nice Find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located well in the city. It was a little tricky to find so I suggest mapping it out or asking the hotel for directions before arrival. We were promptly checked in and the staff was very friendly, no issues there. We did arrive in Copenhagen during a heat spell and the lack of aircon did force us to begin our exploration of the city a little earlier than we had planned, but not much of a big deal and it sounds like a lot of the hotels in the area do without aircon anyways. We had a room that faced the courtyard which did not have a lot of noise.
reviews.title: Cool

reviews.text: What a funky hotel! Stayed here for my sister's 30th birthday. Got a triple and double room. As other guests have already said, rooms not huge, but you don't need it any bigger.
reviews.title: Very funky hotel, although a couple of little qualms

likes.disliked: — one member of staff who was very rude! [onlu one though - the rest were lovely!]

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Liked the wall between the bedroom and shower - was like thick, frosted glass, although you couldn't see anything!
reviews.title: Great location

likes.disliked: — Bed too soft for my taste

reviews.text: As previous guests have said, the rooms were very hot. We opened the window which was ok. We had asked for rooms facing the back of the hotel because of noise off the street. We got our request. Think it would have been a bit annoying if we had to open the windows onto a noisy street below.
reviews.title: cool hotel, great location, great staff, poor room ventilation

likes.disliked: — porr ventialtion in rooms, try a ceiling fan

reviews.text: Location of hotel was great. 5 minutes walk away from train station and Tivoli gardens. Round the corner from start of sight seeing buses outside Town Hall.
reviews.title: overprised

reviews.text: Loved the ice bar. Expensive but worth it. Loved the decor all over the hotel, really funky.
reviews.title: Rooms Are So Small and Hot - avoid it!

reviews.text: This hotel is fairly new and has a modern twist to it. The staff were polite and helpful and the evening buffet (snacks) was a nice surprise.
reviews.title: Modern, Trendy Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed here with business colleagues but would definitely return again whether it be business or pleasure.
reviews.title: Cool, funky hotel!

likes.liked: — Looks new, funky and good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were well equipped and comfortable.
reviews.title: Great Find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 days on a buissness trip in may 2007. The hotel looks newly refurbished, modern, trendy and funky. The room was small, but very clean and newish looking. Same goes for the bathroom. No view, but comfortable bed.
reviews.title: Really nicve

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great breakfast with a selection of bread, egg, different types of spread, some hot food and excellent youghurt with acacia honey and cereal. The location isfantastic. Just a couple of blocks away from "strøget" which is the main street in Copenhagen.
reviews.title: Good hotel, perfect location.
